item.title: 2022-07-20 Message to YEA Slack
item.description: 2022-07-20 Draft Message to YEA Slack I would like to call a serious meeting to seriously evaluate my performance as a community builder.

item.title: 2022-07-20 Messages to Send to Thomas, Miriam, Alexa, and Teddy Regarding EA Blacklist
item.description: 2022-07-20 Messages to Send to Thomas, Miriam, Alexa, and Teddy Regarding EA Blacklist Immediate Thoughts After Matt Things I Am Grateful I am grateful that Matt brought this up to me.

item.title: [[2022-06-20]] Post About Diversity in Effective Altruism
item.description: [[2022-06-20]] Post About Diversity in Effective Altruism On the topic of diversity: YEA is one of the most diverse EA groups out there, and one of the biggest shockers for me when I first engaged with the broader EA community was the stark contrast and lack of diversity.
